wikipedia_page.main: David L. Smith (born 3 December 1963 in London) is a noted historian at Selwyn College, Cambridge. He specializes in Early Modern British history, particularly political, constitutional, legal and religious history within the Stuart period.  He is the author or co-author of eight books, and the editor or co-editor of six others, and he has also published more than seventy articles (see list of chief publications below).

response: * David L. Smith (hacker) (born c. 1968), author of the Melissa virus
